import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import Navbar from '../Components/Navbar'; import './Workers.css'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; function Workers() { const [workers, setWorkers] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { axios.get("http://localhost:5000/users/") .then(res => {setWorkers(res.data)}) .catch(err => {console.log(err)}) }, []) return (
